extensionDescription.message: An extension to add new buttons and keyboard shortcuts to uttv.ee video player.

pbrate100.message: Set playback rate to default 1x (keyboard shortcut: change speed using ↑/↓)

pbrate125.message: Set playback rate to 1.25x (keyboard shortcut: change speed using ↑/↓)

pbrate150.message: Set playback rate to 1.50x (keyboard shortcut: change speed using ↑/↓)

pbrate175.message: Set playback rate to 1.75x (keyboard shortcut: change speed using ↑/↓)

ts_save.message: Save timestamp; use 'Load timestamp' to continue video playback from the saved position

ts_load.message: Load timestamp: continue video playback from the saved timestamp

optionDisplayButtonbar.message: Display buttons: buttons are shown below the video; keyboard shortcuts continue to work either way.

optionAutohideButtonbar.message: Auto-hide buttons: buttons will automatically hidden when mouse cursor is not near the video.
